Gentoo Linux Installation Guide with Screenshots (amd64 Architecture, Glibc library, gcc Compiler, openRC Service Manager, GRUB Bootloader)

  • Samuel Yang
  • May 31, 2023

This step-by-step installation guide with screenshots will walk you through the process of installing Gentoo Linux on an AMD64 system using the Glibc library, GCC compiler, OpenRC init system, and GRUB Bootloader.
